column2: A simple and flexible class for presenting custom views as a popup in iOS.

column5: Fix layout and rotation handling for iOS 8.

Merge pull request #2 from nicopuri/master

Created the podspec file.
Re-implemented support for showing popup at explicit coordinates - cleaner and easier.
Adds support for specifying custom center coordinates for the popup, as alternative to layout presets.
refactored popup to use cleaner 'layout' structure rather than independent variables for horizontal and vertical.
Enabled customizing alpha for dimmed background mask.
Changed naming convention from 'hide' to 'dismiss' to be more understandable.
Added launch images to example project.
In phone idiom, making sure selected field row is scrolled into view when table is presented
Cleaned up convenience methods for popup creation.
Declared private methods in example project
For Phone idiom, changed field selector from a UIPickerView to a UITableView presented modally.
Changed example so layout is manages by a tableView - much cleaner.
Added support for all device orientations.
Removed '/////' method separator formatting from source code.
Added another animation type for growing in and bouncing, or bouncing and shrinking out,
Using UIPopoverController with tableView, instead of UIPickerView, for field controls on iPad in example project.
Adds option to hide-after-delay in example.
styling for custom popup in example.
